channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: You can pair a tiny wireless mic to this 4K webcam
item.description: Hollyland, a company best known for affordable wireless microphones that are popular with creators, has announced its first webcam, the small 4K Lyra. While it lacks advanced features like the Insta360 Link's tracking gimbal, it's one of the first webcams we've seen that's designed to improve how you sound by connecting directly to one of […]

item.title: Instagram Bringing Vertical Video to TVs
item.description: You don't even have to turn your TV sideways.

item.title: ChatGPT Images s’améliore : OpenAI muscle son générateur pour répondre à Google et Nano Banana
item.description: Face à la montée en puissance de Google Gemini, OpenAI continue de muscler ChatGPT. La start-up vient d'annoncer une nouvelle version de son générateur d'images. Il est désormais animé par le modèle gpt-image-1.5, qui se veut plus rapide, et plus précis.

item.title: Karl Urban Says Johnny Cage Is the Most Physically Demanding Role He’s Ever Had
item.description: He's been in 'Lord of the Rings,' 'Star Trek,' 'Dredd,' 'The Boys,' and many more, but 'Mortal Kombat II' really put the star to the test.

item.title: Les astronomes se préparent : le 3e visiteur interstellaire connu passera au plus près de la Terre le 19 décembre
item.description: Le visiteur interstellaire 3I/Atlas sera au plus proche de la Terre le 19 décembre prochain. L'occasion de profiter de ce spectacle unique, concernant un astre mystérieux qui est encore loin d'avoir livré tous ses secrets.

item.title: Obscura VPN just aced its first independent audit
item.description: Obscura VPN, a relatively new VPN service for iOS and macOS, has just passed its first independent audit. The VPN prioritizes not just user security, but also complete browsing privacy.

item.title: ChatGPT Image : OpenAI répond enfin à Google Nano Banana
item.description: OpenAI annonce une nouvelle version majeure de ChatGPT pour la génération ou la modification d'images.

item.title: DoorDash rolls out Zesty, an AI social app for discovering new restaurants
item.description: Users can view and share photos and comments about restaurants they’ve visited, discover content from others, and follow people just like on any social network.

item.title: CES 2026 preview: What we're expecting from tech's biggest conference in January
item.description: CES doesn't start until January, but whispers of the products and announcements that could be in store for tech's biggest annual conference have already started to take shape. The CES 2026 show floor is officially open from January 6 through 9, although the show kicks off with events on Sunday January 4 and a host of press conferences on Monday. As always, product demos, announcements and networking will be happening at the Las Vegas Convention Center and surrounding hotels all over the city. As usual, Engadget will be covering the event in-person and remotely, bringing you news and hands-ons ...

item.title: Soundcloud confirms data breach - user info stolen, here's what you need to know
item.description: About a fifth of Soundcloud's user base had email details stolen, but banking and login information was unaffected

item.title: Amazon’s Kindle is a great gift, and most models are on sale right now
item.description: If you’re shopping for a book lover, it’s hard to beat a Kindle, especially if your giftee already owns a library of Kindle books. Amazon’s latest sale makes them even easier to recommend: the last-gen Kindle Scribe with 32GB of storage and ads is matching its best price to date starting at $279.99 ($140 off) […]

item.title: Meta’s AI glasses can now help you hear conversations better
item.description: Conversation focus uses the AI glasses' open-ear speakers to amplify the voice of the person you're talking to, says Meta.

item.title: VW Closes German Plant for First Time Ever. Plant Will Pivot to AI Research
item.description: The auto industry continues its push into an AI-driven future

item.title: Larry Ellison’s big dumb gift to his large adult son
item.description: Media is a business about dreams, and Larry Ellison's son is dreaming big. This might explain why the case for Paramount Skydance to buy Warner Bros. Discovery is so incoherent. In October, Warner Bros. put itself up for sale, leading to a number of bids. The two we are concerned with are a bid from […]

item.title: OpenAI continues on its ‘code red’ warpath with new image generation model
item.description: OpenAI rolls out GPT Image 1.5 for ChatGPT, promising 4x faster generation, better instruction-following, and precise edits. The launch escalates its rivalry with Google Gemini.

item.title: The best deals on 4K TVs
item.description: Things are looking bright for those who want to nab a great TV in 2025 at a substantial discount. There’s usually a great deal happening on a mid- or high-end TV from LG, Sony, Hisense, or Samsung — even if the biggest discounts remain reserved for Black Friday, Amazon Prime Day, and the lead-up to […]

item.title: OpenAI’s new flagship image generator AI is here
item.description: OpenAI is overhauling its image generator with a new model and redesigned interface. On Tuesday, the company announced its "new flagship image generation model," GPT Image 1.5, which it said has a better ability to follow instructions, edit photos in specific ways, and generate results up to four times more quickly. It's available today to […]

item.title: How Luminar’s doomed Volvo deal helped drag the company into bankruptcy
item.description: Luminar says trouble with Volvo started as early as 2022, and that the Swedish automaker made -- but then backed away from -- large orders of its lidar sensors.

item.title: Uber Eats alum lands $14M seed from a16z to fix WhatsApp chaos for LatAm’s doctors
item.description: Leona Health built an AI co-pilot to manage the flood of patient messages Latin American doctors receive on WhatsApp.

item.title: Test du GTBOX G-Dock : ajoutez une carte graphique dédiée à votre mini PC, PC portable ou console-PC pour pas cher
item.description: Vous avez une vieille carte graphique qui traîne ? Ce dock à 230 € peut transformer votre ultrabook en machine de gaming. On l'a testé !

item.title: Movie Posters Leveled Up (at Least a Little Bit) in 2025
item.description: More artistic takes on films like 'The Fantastic Four,' 'Bugonia,' and 'Frankenstein' showed that studios may finally be learning.

item.title: RFK Jr. Is Taking on Lyme, but His Whacked-Out Conspiracy Theories Are Worse Than the Disease
item.description: Kennedy has previously argued that Lyme is "highly likely to have been a military weapon."

item.title: Google wants its AI assistant CC to replace your morning scroll
item.description: Google wants you to start your day with AI. Google's AI, to be specific, which is why the company is launching an experimental agent to comb through your emails, calendar, and documents to deliver a briefing to your inbox every morning. The new feature, called CC, delivers a daily "Your Day Ahead" briefing to your […]

item.title: Google tests an email-based productivity assistant
item.description: Google's new email-based assistant will be available to AI Pro and Ultra plan users over the age of 18 in North America.

item.title: Mainstream handheld makers are on the verge of spoiling the appeal of portable gaming — the MSI Claw A8 is just over $1,000
item.description: The MSI Claw A8 looks set to be another handheld costing over $1,000, and this may eventually destroy the appeal of handheld gaming.

item.title: Ford's discontinued F-150 Lightning pick-up truck never stood a chance – here's why
item.description: Production of the current F-150 Lightning electric pick-up will come to an end this year, as Ford pivots back to gasoline and hybrids.

item.title: ChatGPT image generation is now faster and better at following tweaks
item.description: Following the release of GPT-5.2 last week, OpenAI has begun rolling out a new image generation model. The company says the updated ChatGPT Images is four times faster than its predecessor. If you're a frequent ChatGPT user, you'll know it can sometimes take a while for OpenAI's servers to create images, particularly during peak times and if you're not paying for ChatGPT Plus. In that respect, any improvement in speed is welcome. The new version is also better at following instructions, including when you want to edit something the new model just generated. You can ask the system to add, subtr...

item.title: The U.S. is now blocking visas for people who fight misinformation
item.description: The government says fact-checkers and content moderators are ‘censors’—and Big Tech isn’t saying a word. Earlier this month, the State Department announced that it was instructing U.S. embassy staff around the world to reject work visa applications from individuals involved in what it described as “censorship” of Americans’ speech online. In a cable that was first leaked to Reuters, consular officers were instructed to review LinkedIn profiles of visa applicants mentioning work history involving “misinformation, disinformation, content moderation, fact-checking, compliance, and online safety.”...

item.title: Jeux Switch : les meilleures offres du Nintendo eShop en décembre
item.description: Sur la période de Noël, nombreuses sont les boutiques de jeux en ligne à proposer des promotions. C'est le cas de celle de Nintendo où de nombreux titres sont à prix cassé : voici les meilleures offres du eShop de la Switch en décembre 2025.

item.title: Amazon UK's last-minute gifts sale is live – I've hand-picked the 29 best deals on TVs, appliances, headphones, and more
item.description: Amazon's UK last-minute sale continues this week, so I've gathered together 29 of the best deals if you're shopping for some gift inspiration or hunting down some final tech bargains of the year.

item.title: What 1,000 pages of documents tell us about DOGE
item.description: Months after staffers from the Department of Government Efficiency were found in the Federal Communications Commission directory, the FCC is being accused of slow-walking demands for information about what they did there. On February 24th, advocacy group Frequency Forward and journalist Nina Burleigh filed a public records request to the FCC, seeking details about DOGE's […]...

item.title: Ghost of Yōtei studio Sucker Punch is getting new leadership
item.description: Sucker Punch Productions, the PlayStation studio behind games like Ghost of Yōtei and the Infamous and Sly Cooper series, will be headed up by Jason Connell and Adrian Bentley starting January 1st, Sony announced on Tuesday. Studio co-founder Brian Fleming is stepping down and will be "passing Sucker Punch studio leadership on to a new […]

item.title: Sony’s XM5 over-ear headphones are cheaper than ever — and they come with free wireless earbuds
item.description: If you’re looking for a solid pair of noise-canceling headphones, the Sony WH-1000XM5 are a great option. While they’re not the latest version in Sony’s lineup — that’s the WH-1000XM6 — they still offer excellent active noise cancellation, detail-rich sound, and enhanced voice call quality thanks to the inclusion of eight microphones. And right now, […]...

item.title: Meta rolls out AI glasses update with conversation boosting feature
item.description: Back at Meta Connect, Meta teased that its AI glasses would soon support a conversation boosting feature to help folks hear better in noisy environments. That feature is rolling out starting today for Ray-Ban Meta and Oakley Meta HSTN glasses owners who've opted into the company's Early Access Program. The feature, dubbed Conversation Focus, is […]

item.title: Who should pay for the power grid’s race to keep up with data centers?
item.description: In different states, this is playing out differently. The amount of electricity data centers use in the U.S. in the coming years is expected to be significant. But regular reports of proposals for new ones and cancellations of planned ones mean that it’s difficult to know exactly how many data centers will actually be built and how much electricity might be required to run them....

item.title: These new open earbuds offer head-tracked Dolby Atmos — the best feature of Sonos' headphones is coming to buds at last
item.description: Cleer's new open-ears promise superb spatial audio in their Atmos edition

item.title: Rainbow Six Mobile will finally be available in February after years of testing
item.description:
The long-awaited Rainbow Six Mobile comes out on February 23 for iOS and Android devices. This is a global release and follows years of testing and some significant delays. This is basically a smartphone version of the popular tactical shooter Rainbow Six Siege. It was "developed exclusively" for mobile devices and features a trio of 5v5 multiplayer modes. There's a team deathmatch, of course, and a pair of bomb-defusing games that are riffs on a pre-existing mode from Siege.
Rainbow Six Mobile offers access to a bunch of maps, including some that will be familiar to fans of the franchise. Th...

item.title: Avis aux gamers, cet écran PC 4K QD Mini LED de 27″ devient le super deal du jour avec près de 40 % de remise
item.description: Envie d’un écran PC de qualité pour jouer ? Ce moniteur TCL, doté d’une dalle QD Mini LED 4K de 27″ à 160 Hz, vous fait profiter de parties réactives et bien fluides sans vous ruiner. Il est d’ailleurs en promotion à 427 euros contre 699 euros au départ.

item.title: Last-minute gift idea: This DeLonghi espresso machine is on sale for under $100
item.description: The De'Longhi 15-bar pump espresso machine is on sale at Amazon for only $99.95. That's a 50% discount and its best price ever.

item.title: Why NASA’s New $4 Billion Telescope Will Stare at Absolutely Nothing
item.description: The next-gen Nancy Grace Roman Space Telescope is slated to explore vast cosmic voids to uncover the hidden forces shaping the universe.

item.title: The Skylight Calendar, one of our top gifts for moms and dads, is $90 off at Best Buy for one day
item.description: The digital Skylight Calendar is an excellent gift idea for busy parents. It's $229.99 at Best Buy on Dec. 16, beating Black Friday.

item.title: OpenAI Rolls Back ChatGPT’s Model Router System for Most Users
item.description: As OpenAI scrambles to improve ChatGPT, it's ditching a feature in its free tier that contributed to last summer's user revolt.
